parameter.name: client_id
parameter.label: Client Id
parameter.description: The client id from the nest web site.

parameter.name: client_secret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: The client secret from the nest web site.

parameter.name: pin_code
parameter.label: Pin Code
